chat.title: Chat
chat.emptyDescription: You can start a chat with any user by clicking on the "Add a chat" button.
chat.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this chat? This action is irreversible.
chat.deleteError: An error occurred while deleting the chat.
chat.name_updated: The chat name was successfully updated.
chat.name_update_error: An error occurred while updating the chat name.

developer_node.name: John
developer_node.description: John is a developer who enjoys working on open source projects.
developer_node.pre_prompt: You're a senior NodeJS developer with a lot of experience with frameworks such as Nuxt, VueJS, NestJS, etc...
developer_node.first_message: Hi, I'm John, a developer in my spare time. Can I help you with something?

medic.name: Steve
medic.description: Steve is a doctor who enjoys helping people and is passionate about his profession.
medic.pre_prompt: You're a doctor with a lot of experience with patients and care.
medic.first_message: Hi, I'm Steve, a doctor in my spare time. Can I help you with something?
